statements: SELECT * FROM MusicalLibrary;
SELECT score_title, composer, genre FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Classical';
SELECT recording_title, recording_artist, recording_duration FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Jazz';
SELECT score_title, composer FROM MusicalLibrary ORDER BY composer DESC;
SELECT * FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE composer='Beethoven' AND genre='Classical';
SELECT * FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Classical' ORDER BY score_title DESC;
SELECT score_title, composer, recording_title FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE recording_artist='Mozart' ORDER BY recording_duration ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT composer FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Jazz';
SELECT score_title, composer, recording_duration FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Pop' AND recording_duration > 180 ORDER BY recording_duration DESC;
SELECT score_title, composer, recording_artist, recording_duration FROM MusicalLibrary WHERE genre='Rock' AND recording_duration < 300 ORDER BY composer, recording_duration;
SELECT * FROM scores WHERE genre = 'Classical';
SELECT composer, title FROM scores WHERE release_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT title, release_date FROM scores ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE format = 'MP3' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT artist, title, duration FROM recordings WHERE duration <= '00:05:00';
SELECT * FROM scores WHERE genre='Classical' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT title, composer FROM scores WHERE composer IS NOT NULL AND genre='Jazz'
SELECT score_id, title, genre FROM scores WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE artist='John Doe' AND format='CD' ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT title, artist, duration FROM recordings WHERE duration > '00:05:00'
SELECT * FROM Scores;
SELECT title, composer, genre FROM Scores ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT score_id, composer FROM Scores WHERE genre='Classical';
SELECT * FROM Recordings WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT title, artist FROM Recordings WHERE artist='John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Scores;
SELECT title, composer, publication_year FROM Scores WHERE genre = 'Classical';
SELECT * FROM Recordings WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT title, artist, album, release_year FROM Recordings WHERE artist LIKE '%John%' OR artist LIKE '%Jane%' ORDER BY release_year DESC;

SELECT s.title, r.artist AS recording_artist FROM Scores s INNER JOIN Score_Recordings sr ON s.score_id = sr.score_id INNER JOIN Recordings r ON sr.recording_id = r.recording_id WHERE s.genre = 'Jazz';
SELECT * FROM scores;
SELECT title, composer, year_published FROM scores WHERE genre='Classical';
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE debut_year > 2000;
SELECT composer_name, nationality, birth_year FROM composers WHERE death_year IS NULL;
SELECT title, artist, release_year FROM recordings ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT title, composer, genre FROM scores WHERE year_published > 2000 ORDER BY composer ASC, title DESC;
SELECT title, artist, duration FROM recordings WHERE release_year = 2021 ORDER BY artist DESC, duration ASC;
SELECT composer_name, nationality, birth_year, death_year FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'Russian' AND death_year IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, debut_year, active FROM artists WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY debut_year DESC, artist_name ASC;
SELECT title, composer, genre FROM scores WHERE year_published BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY year_published DESC, composer ASC;
SELECT * FROM scores;
SELECT title, composer FROM scores WHERE genre='Classical' ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT title, release_year FROM recordings WHERE artist='John Doe';
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM scores ORDER BY publication_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, composer, publication_year FROM scores WHERE genre = 'Classical' OR genre = 'Jazz';
SELECT scores.title, composers.composer_name FROM scores JOIN composers ON scores.composer = composers.composer_id WHERE composers.birth_year < 1900;
SELECT scores.title, recordings.artist FROM scores JOIN recordings ON scores.title = recordings.title WHERE recordings.release_year > 2000;
SELECT scores.title, artists.artist_name FROM scores JOIN recordings ON scores.title = recordings.title JOIN artists ON recordings.artist = artists.artist_id WHERE scores.genre = 'Pop';
